name: Alexa,HowmanyDaysuntilChristmas
0:
”Alexa, open days until christmas”
”Alexa, start days until christmas”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: days until christmas
des:
Say, "Alexa, open days until christmas" and she'll tell you how many days until christmas.
This was created using a Blueprint, by the way. It was really simple to make.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
